trans-unit.source:
Hi,
Unfortunately, an item on your order is currently out of stock. This may cause a slight delay in delivery. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we are working hard to rectify this.
Best regards,
trans-unit.target:
Pozdrav,
Nažalost, proizvod koji ste naručili trenutno je rasprodan. To može uzrokovati neznatno kašnjenje u isporuci. Molimo prihvatite naše izvinjenje i budite uvjereni da ćemo naporno raditi kako bi se ispravio ovaj propust
S poštovanjem,

trans-unit.source: This customer is registered as a Guest.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj kupac je registriran kao Gost.
Pretvorite ga u korisnički račun kupca

trans-unit.source: %firstname% %lastname% has not placed any orders yet
trans-unit.target: %firstname% %lastname% još nije postavljena niti jedna narudžba

trans-unit.source: This order has been placed by a guest.
This order has been partially paid by voucher. Choose the amount you want to refund:
trans-unit.target: Ovaj nalog je djelomično plaćen vaučerom. Odaberite iznos za koji želite povrat:

trans-unit.source: This order has been partially paid by voucher. Choose the amount you want to refund:
trans-unit.target: Ovaj nalog je djelomično plaćen vaučerom. Odaberite iznos za koji želite povrat:

trans-unit.source: Product(s) price, excluding amount of initial voucher:
trans-unit.target: Cijena proizvoda, isključujući inicijalni iznos vaučera:

trans-unit.source: The national ID card number of this person, or a unique tax identification number.
trans-unit.target: Nacionalni broj lične kartke te osobe, ili jedinstveni porezni identifikacijski broj.

trans-unit.source: Reset sequential invoice number at the beginning of the year
trans-unit.target: Reset rednoga broja fakture na početku godine

trans-unit.source: Your reply will be sent to:
trans-unit.target: Vaš odgovor bit će poslan na:

trans-unit.source: [1]%count%[/1] order(s) validated for a total amount of [2]%total%[/2]
trans-unit.target: [1]%count%[/1] narudžba(e) potvrđeno u ukupnom iznosu od [2]%total%[/2]

trans-unit.source: Forward this discussion to an employee:
